title: Co-Design-Based Flexible Science Learning Pathway Development Process

context.additional_context: Project-based course for novice practitioners to design personalized learning pathways using digital devices; summative assessment-driven evaluation system applied

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three science concepts related to the project topic and establish a personal learning plan
Learners can collaboratively design at least two flexible learning pathways through the collaboration process with peers
Learners can achieve at least 80% of weekly learning progress and performance using digital tools
Learners can demonstrate the effectiveness of the learning pathways they designed for scientific problem-solving in the final project
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
